original_text: Have any other nations turned against their gods? No! They have not done that, even to their false gods! But my people have turned against me, the true God who makes them great.’ Have any other nations turned against their gods? No! They have not done that, even to their false gods! But my people have turned against me, the true God who makes them great.’ Have any other nations turned against their gods?
korean_text: 어느 나라가 그들의 신들을 신 아닌 것과 바꾼 일이 있느냐 그러나 나의 백성은 그의 영광을 무익한 것과 바꾸었도다

sentences.original_text: Have any other nations turned against their gods?
They have not done that, even to their false gods!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 거짓 신에게도 그렇게 하지 않았습니다!

sentences.original_text: But my people have turned against me,
the true God who makes them great.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 위대하게 만드는 참된 신이신 나를.

sentences.original_text: Have any other nations turned against their gods?
They have not done that, even to their false gods!

the true God who makes them great.'
